default_text: Sorry, I didn't understand. Please try again.
default_number: Sorry, I didn't recognize that as a number. Please enter a number.
default_confirm: Sorry, I didn't understand. Please answer 'yes' or 'no'.

default_time: Sorry, I didn't recognize the time you entered. Please try again using a format of (MM/DD/YYYY HH:MM:SS).
